name: Sithara
text: Wade godak hodai mlli.2nd yr unata mtnm aththatama coding amrui kiyla thma mm baye hitiye..hbai dn mt terenwa coding amru na api e wenuwen inna oni e gana awadane wdi krnna oni mokada oya dwsk ara dwsk session tiyala e class eka krna widiya maru ethkota apita puluwn coding wlta labadena time eka wadi karagnda activity dena ewath mm step by step krnwa mokada eka record ekkwath miss krgn nthuwa mm blnwa.rrecording balana gmn oya karana wda tika math krnwa..teren nathuwa idapu coding terenwa mlli dan .1000ta e uganwanawa wdith ekka ehemai kiyla time eka adu krnna epoo e ganath pahasui mlli.thwa lamai tikak hoygnda tibbanm oyatth hodai.mm mheshatai thakshiltai kiwa enna maru wde kiyala e denna issrahta join wei...mm thwama 5th rrecording eka balala iwarai.mt terenawa issoroma dawsata wda mt dan terenwa mt dn puluwn kiyala meka krgena ynda..thnkq mlli.mn intern eka gana baye idiye dan hithenwa intern eka weddi baya adu krgnda puluwn wei kiyla me widiyta wda tika krgena giyoth...ATI patan gaththama time eka hoda dwskta dagamu.Wde digtma krgena ymu mlli.thank u
